quotes: From 1982 to 1989, he was Vice Chairman of Kissinger Associates, Inc., an international consulting firm.
In 1991, General Scowcroft was presented with the Presidential Medal of Freedom, the nation’s highest civilian honor, by President George H.W. Bush
In 1993 was awarded an honorary knighthood – a Knight Commander of the Order of the British Empire (KBE) – by Queen Elizabeth II.
In 2009, he was presented the Grand Cross of the Order of Merit of the Federal Republic of Germany.

organizations.name: The Scowcroft Group
quotes: PRESIDENT, SCOWCROFT GROUP

organizations.name: Kissinger Associates, Inc.
quotes: From 1982 to 1989, he was Vice Chairman of Kissinger Associates, Inc., an international consulting firm.

organizations.name: West Point
quotes: His extraordinary twenty-nine-year military career began with graduation from West Point and concluded at the rank of Lieutenant General following service as the Deputy National Security Advisor.
He was recognized as a Distinguished Graduate of West Point, and earned his masters and doctorate in international relations from Columbia University.

organizations.name: Air Force
quotes: His Air Force service included Professor of Russian History at West Point; Assistant Air Attaché in Belgrade, Yugoslavia; Head of the Political Science Department at the Air Force Academy; Air Force Long Range Plans;

organizations.name: Office of the Secretary of Defense
quotes: Office of the Secretary of Defense International Security Assistance;

organizations.name: Joint Chiefs of Staff
quotes: Special Assistant to the Director of the Joint Chiefs of Staff;

organizations.name: President's General Advisory Committee on Arms Control
quotes: Out of uniform, General Scowcroft continued in a public policy capacity by serving on the President’s General Advisory Committee on Arms Control, the President’s Commission on Strategic Forces, the President’s Blue Ribbon Commission on Defense Management and the President’s Special Review Board.

organizations.name: Blue Ribbon Commission on America’s Nuclear Future
quotes: In recent years, he has served as a co-chair for both the Blue Ribbon Commission on America’s Nuclear Future and the National Academies of Science’s Committee on Science, Security, and Prosperity.

roles.title: National Security Advisor
quotes: Brent Scowcroft served as the National Security Advisor to both Presidents Gerald Ford and George H.W. Bush, the only individual in U.S. history appointed to the position under two different Presidents.
